entry.content:

Aug 24, 22:54 UTC
Scheduled - We will be performing maintenance on a portion of Linode’s infrastructure in our Frankfurt data center. During this time, affected Linodes will remain powered on but may experience delays executing reboot, shut down, or other actions from the Cloud Manager or API. Linodes may also experience a brief period of increased latency. This maintenance will only affect Linode’s infrastructure and not affect any customer data.

A 3-hour maintenance window is allocated, but the actual effect should be much shorter.

This status page will be updated once the maintenance is complete.
